thread.title: Modders are turning the NES Classic Edition into an all-purpose retro gaming machine
thread.title_full: Modders are turning the NES Classic Edition into an all-purpose retro gaming machine

author: blogsonjapan
title: Modders are turning the NES Classic Edition into an all-purpose retro gaming machine
text:
Source: techcrunch.com 
If you were lucky enough to get your hands on a NES Classic Edition this last holiday season, you were probably impressed (as I was) with the quality of the emulation — so much so you wished it had a few more games, or maybe even that there was an SNES version. Well, your dream is coming true — kind of, anyway. Read More
